an8.22:1.1: Ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā vajjīsu viharati hatthigāme.
an8.22:1.3: “aṭṭhahi, bhikkhave, acchariyehi abbhutehi dhammehi samannāgataṁ uggaṁ gahapatiṁ hatthigāmakaṁ dhārethā”ti.
an8.22:1.5: Idaṁ vatvāna sugato uṭṭhāyāsanā vihāraṁ pāvisi.
an8.22:2.1: Atha kho aññataro bhikkhu pubbaṇhasamayaṁ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya yena uggassa gahapatino hatthigāmakassa nivesanaṁ tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā paññatte āsane nisīdi.
an8.22:2.2: Atha kho uggo gahapati hatthigāmako yena so bhikkhu tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā taṁ bhikkhuṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi. Ekamantaṁ nisinnaṁ kho uggaṁ gahapatiṁ hatthigāmakaṁ so bhikkhu etadavoca:
an8.22:2.3: “aṭṭhahi kho tvaṁ, gahapati, acchariyehi abbhutehi dhammehi samannāgato bhagavatā byākato.
an8.22:2.4: Katame te, gahapati, aṭṭha acchariyā abbhutā dhammā, yehi tvaṁ samannāgato bhagavatā byākato”ti?
an8.22:3.2: ‘katamehi aṭṭhahi acchariyehi abbhutehi dhammehi samannāgato bhagavatā byākato’ti.
an8.22:3.3: Api ca, bhante, ye me aṭṭha acchariyā abbhutā dhammā saṁvijjanti,
an8.22:3.4: taṁ suṇāhi, sādhukaṁ manasi karohi; bhāsissāmī”ti.
an8.22:3.5: “Evaṁ, gahapatī”ti kho so bhikkhu uggassa gahapatino hatthigāmakassa paccassosi.
an8.22:3.7: “yadāhaṁ, bhante, nāgavane paricaranto bhagavantaṁ paṭhamaṁ dūratova addasaṁ;
an8.22:3.8: saha dassaneneva me, bhante, bhagavato cittaṁ pasīdi, surāmado ca pahīyi.
an8.22:3.9: Ayaṁ kho me, bhante, paṭhamo acchariyo abbhuto dhammo saṁvijjati.
an8.22:4.1: So kho ahaṁ, bhante, pasannacitto bhagavantaṁ payirupāsiṁ.
an8.22:4.2: Tassa me bhagavā anupubbiṁ kathaṁ kathesi, seyyathidaṁ—
an8.22:4.3: dānakathaṁ sīlakathaṁ saggakathaṁ; kāmānaṁ ādīnavaṁ okāraṁ saṅkilesaṁ, nekkhamme ānisaṁsaṁ pakāsesi.
an8.22:4.4: Yadā maṁ bhagavā aññāsi kallacittaṁ muducittaṁ vinīvaraṇacittaṁ udaggacittaṁ pasannacittaṁ, atha yā buddhānaṁ sāmukkaṁsikā dhammadesanā taṁ pakāsesi—
an8.22:4.6: Seyyathāpi nāma suddhaṁ vatthaṁ apagatakāḷakaṁ sammadeva rajanaṁ paṭiggaṇheyya;
an8.22:4.7: evamevaṁ kho me tasmiṁyeva āsane virajaṁ vītamalaṁ dhammacakkhuṁ udapādi:
an8.22:4.9: So kho ahaṁ, bhante, diṭṭhadhammo pattadhammo viditadhammo pariyogāḷhadhammo tiṇṇavicikiccho vigatakathaṅkatho vesārajjappatto aparappaccayo satthusāsane tattheva buddhañca dhammañca saṅghañca saraṇaṁ agamāsiṁ, brahmacariyapañcamāni ca sikkhāpadāni samādiyiṁ.
an8.22:4.10: Ayaṁ kho me, bhante, dutiyo acchariyo abbhuto dhammo saṁvijjati.
an8.22:5.1: Tassa mayhaṁ, bhante, catasso komāriyo pajāpatiyo ahesuṁ.
an8.22:5.2: Atha khvāhaṁ, bhante, yena tā pajāpatiyo tenupasaṅkamiṁ; upasaṅkamitvā tā pajāpatiyo etadavacaṁ:
an8.22:5.4: Yā icchati sā idheva bhoge ca bhuñjatu puññāni ca karotu, sakāni vā ñātikulāni gacchatu.
an8.22:5.5: Hoti vā pana purisādhippāyo, kassa vo dammī’ti?
an8.22:5.6: Evaṁ vutte, sā, bhante, jeṭṭhā pajāpati maṁ etadavoca:
an8.22:5.8: Atha kho ahaṁ, bhante, taṁ purisaṁ pakkosāpetvā vāmena hatthena pajāpatiṁ gahetvā dakkhiṇena hatthena bhiṅgāraṁ gahetvā tassa purisassa oṇojesiṁ.
an8.22:5.9: Komāriṁ kho panāhaṁ, bhante, dāraṁ pariccajanto nābhijānāmi cittassa aññathattaṁ.
an8.22:5.10: Ayaṁ kho me, bhante, tatiyo acchariyo abbhuto dhammo saṁvijjati.
an8.22:6.1: Saṁvijjanti kho pana me, bhante, kule bhogā.
an8.22:6.2: Te ca kho appaṭivibhattā sīlavantehi kalyāṇadhammehi.
an8.22:6.3: Ayaṁ kho me, bhante, catuttho acchariyo abbhuto dhammo saṁvijjati.
an8.22:7.1: Yaṁ kho panāhaṁ, bhante, bhikkhuṁ payirupāsāmi;
an8.22:7.3: So ce me āyasmā dhammaṁ deseti;
an8.22:7.5: No ce me so āyasmā dhammaṁ deseti, ahamassa dhammaṁ desemi.
an8.22:7.6: Ayaṁ kho me, bhante, pañcamo acchariyo abbhuto dhammo saṁvijjati.
an8.22:8.1: Anacchariyaṁ kho pana, bhante, saṅghe nimantite devatā upasaṅkamitvā ārocenti:
an8.22:8.2: ‘asuko, gahapati, bhikkhu ubhatobhāgavimutto asuko paññāvimutto asuko kāyasakkhī asuko diṭṭhippatto asuko saddhāvimutto asuko dhammānusārī asuko saddhānusārī asuko sīlavā kalyāṇadhammo asuko dussīlo pāpadhammo’ti.
an8.22:8.3: Saṅghaṁ kho panāhaṁ, bhante, parivisanto nābhijānāmi evaṁ cittaṁ uppādento:
an8.22:8.4: ‘imassa vā thokaṁ demi imassa vā bahukan’ti.
an8.22:8.6: Ayaṁ kho me, bhante, chaṭṭho acchariyo abbhuto dhammo saṁvijjati.
an8.22:9.1: Anacchariyaṁ kho pana maṁ, bhante, devatā upasaṅkamitvā ārocenti:
an8.22:9.3: Evaṁ vutte, ahaṁ, bhante, tā devatā evaṁ vademi:
an8.22:9.4: ‘vadeyyātha vā evaṁ kho tumhe devatā no vā vadeyyātha, atha kho svākkhāto bhagavatā dhammo’ti.
an8.22:9.5: Na kho panāhaṁ, bhante, abhijānāmi tatonidānaṁ cittassa unnatiṁ:
an8.22:9.6: ‘maṁ tā devatā upasaṅkamanti, ahaṁ vā devatāhi saddhiṁ sallapāmī’ti.
an8.22:9.7: Ayaṁ kho me, bhante, sattamo acchariyo abbhuto dhammo saṁvijjati.
an8.22:10.1: Sace kho panāhaṁ, bhante, bhagavato paṭhamataraṁ kālaṁ kareyyaṁ, anacchariyaṁ kho panetaṁ yaṁ maṁ bhagavā evaṁ byākareyya:
an8.22:10.2: ‘natthi taṁ saṁyojanaṁ yena saṁyutto uggo gahapati hatthigāmako puna imaṁ lokaṁ āgaccheyyā’ti.
an8.22:10.3: Ayaṁ kho me, bhante, aṭṭhamo acchariyo abbhuto dhammo saṁvijjati.
an8.22:11.1: Ime kho me, bhante, aṭṭha acchariyā abbhutā dhammā saṁvijjanti.
an8.22:11.3: ‘katamehi cāhaṁ aṭṭhahi acchariyehi abbhutehi dhammehi samannāgato bhagavatā byākato’”ti.
an8.22:12.1: Atha kho so bhikkhu uggassa gahapatino hatthigāmakassa nivesane piṇḍapātaṁ gahetvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkāmi.
an8.22:12.2: Atha kho so bhikkhu pacchābhattaṁ piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi.
an8.22:12.3: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho so bhikkhu yāvatako ahosi uggena gahapatinā hatthigāmakena saddhiṁ kathāsallāpo, taṁ sabbaṁ bhagavato ārocesi.
an8.22:13.2: Yathā taṁ uggo gahapati hatthigāmako sammā byākaramāno byākareyya, imeheva kho, bhikkhu, aṭṭhahi acchariyehi abbhutehi dhammehi samannāgato uggo gahapati hatthigāmako mayā byākato.
an8.22:13.3: Imehi ca pana, bhikkhu, aṭṭhahi acchariyehi abbhutehi dhammehi samannāgataṁ uggaṁ gahapatiṁ hatthigāmakaṁ dhārehī”ti.
